title: 16-year-old boy killed in shooting in Independence
content:
Autoplay:16-year-old killed in shooting in IndependenceCONNECTING...X16-year-old killed in shooting in Independence
INDEPENDENCE, Mo. - A 16-year-old boy died in a shooting Monday afternoon.
Police said the boy was shot near Truman and Home in Independence, Missouri.
An Independence woman said the victim in Monday's shooting is her son, Javon Reilly.
Jackie Reilly is trying to figure out why someone would kill her youngest son.
I spoke w/ the 16-year-old victim's mother. She is keeping the crime scene tape that surrounded his body. Heartbreaking@41ActionNews at 10 pic.twitter.com/oadK0cO1XM
— Lexi Sutter (@LexiSutterTV) September 20, 2016
"He was a typical teenager," she said. "My son didn't sell drugs, he wasn't out there robbing things. He was trying to get an education.”
The teen was a student at Van Horn High School. Counselors will be available at the school on Tuesday, according to a spokeswoman for the school.
There is no suspect information at this time. If you have any information, please call the TIPS Hotline 816-474-8477.
